text: Martin Grüner (19 July 1929 – 4 February 2018) was a German politician. He was a member of the Free Democratic Party (FDP). He was born in Schramberg, Germany. He was Parliamentary Secretary at the Economics Ministry from 1972 to 1987 and then Parliamentary Secretary at the Environment Ministry until 1991.Announcement of Awards of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany. In: Federal Gazette, No. 172, 13 September 1978. Grüner died on 4 February 2018 at the age of 88.Über viele Jahre in höchster politischer Liga gespielt ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Baden-Württemberg Category:Politicians of the Free Democratic Party of Germany
title: Martin Grüner
